      • Drawwave

        public Drawwave(Wavemangement wavemangement,
                GameSet gameSet,
                java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,processing.core.PImage> maps,
                Mana mana)
        The constructor Drawwave,Creates a Drawwave object for displaying wave-related information.
        参数:
        wavemangement - The wave management system.
        gameSet - The game settings.
        maps - The images and textures.
        mana - The mana management system.

    • 方法详细资料

      • drawwave

        public void drawwave(processing.core.PApplet app)
        Draws the current wave number and prepares the countdown for the next wave.
        参数:
        app - The main PApplet.

      • draw

        public void draw(processing.core.PApplet app)
        Draws the current wave number and prepares the countdown for the next wave ,and whether the is win or lose.
        指定者:
        draw 在类中 DrawTool
        参数:
        app - The main PApplet.
